name: Hikari
summary: Portrait Digital is proud to present the debut EP from ZANIO. DJing in Tokyo and other parts of Japan, ZANIO has become renowned for his musical capabilities and has worked extensively in the Japanese music industry. His music has been selected as the official theme song for San Francisco's JPOP Summit in 2011 and he was also a guest DJ for Anime Expo's Night Party AX Dance 2011 in Los Angeles. We're really excited about this young talent, and we hope to work much more with ZANIO in the future.
info:
• 作曲: ZANIO
  • 编曲: ZANIO
  • 版本特性: Digital
  • 发售日期: 2015-02-23
  • 价格: ¥ 300
  • 播放时长: 14 分
  • 发行商: Portrait Digital
